SolutionRootPath.description: Path to the solution root directory

EntitySchemaName.description: Logical name of the entity for which the control will be created

FormType.description: Type of form: main (main form), quick (quick create), dialog (dialog form), or unknown (auto-detect)

FormId.description: GUID of the specific form where the parameters will be added

TabId.description: GUID of the specific tab where the parameters will be added

TabIndex.description: Index number of the tab (1-based) where the parameters will be added

LookupType.description: Type of lookup: bound (bound lookup) or unbound (unbound lookup)

TabFooterId.description: Unique identifier for the tab footer (automatically generated GUID)

SetToTabFooter.description: Whether to add the parameters to the tab footer (True) or to the main tab content (False)

ParameterType.description: Type of parameters to add: OptionSet (for option set controls), Lookup (for lookup controls), SubGrid (for subgrid controls), Label (for label controls), TextBox (for text box controls), Number (for number controls), or QuickFormCollection (for quick form collection controls)

ColumnIndex.description: Index number of the column (1-based) within the tab where the parameters will be added

SectionIndex.description: Index number of the section (1-based) within the column where the parameters will be added

SectionId.description: GUID of the specific section where the parameters will be added

RowIndex.description: Index number of the row (1-based) within the section where the parameters will be added

EntityLogicalName.description: Logical name of the entity that the lookup refers to. (This parameter is applicable in bound and unbound lookups)

DefaultViewId.description: Default view ID for the lookup control. (This parameter is applicable in bound and unbound lookups)

IsDeDupLookup.description: Enable duplicate detection for lookup. (This parameter is applicable in unbound lookups)

UnboundLookupStyle.description: Style for unbound lookup control. (This parameter is applicable in unbound lookups)

IsInlineNewEnabled.description: Enable inline new record creation. (This parameter is applicable in bound and unbound lookups)

FilterRelationshipName.description: Relationship name for filtering lookup results. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

DependentAttributeName.description: Name of the dependent attribute for lookup filtering. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

DependentAttributeType.description: Type of the dependent attribute for lookup filtering. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

AutoResolve.description: Enable automatic resolution for lookup values. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

ResolveEmailAddress.description: Enable email address resolution for lookup. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

DefaultViewReadOnly.description: Make default view read-only. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

ViewPickerReadOnly.description: Make view picker read-only. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

AllowFilterOff.description: Allow turning off filters in lookup. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

DisableMru.description: Disable most recently used items in lookup. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

DisableQuickFind.description: Disable quick find functionality in lookup. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

DisableViewPicker.description: Disable view picker in lookup. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

AvailableViewIds.description: Available view IDs for lookup. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

InlineViewIds.description: Inline view IDs for lookup. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

UnboundLookupTypes.description: Types for unbound lookup. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

UnboundLookupBrowse.description: Enable browse functionality for unbound lookup. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

UnboundLookupControlType.description: Control type for unbound lookup. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

ShowAsBreadcrumbControl.description: Show as breadcrumb control. (This parameter is applicable in bound lookups)

DefaultValue.description: Default value for the control. (This parameter is applicable in OptionSet controls)

OptionSetName.description: Name of the option set. (This parameter is applicable in OptionSet controls)

OptionSetId.description: ID of the option set. (This parameter is applicable in OptionSet controls)

RecordsPerPage.description: Number of records per page. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

AutoExpand.description: Auto expand behavior for the grid. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

EnableQuickFind.description: Enable quick find functionality. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

EnableViewPicker.description: Enable view picker functionality. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

EnableChartPicker.description: Enable chart picker functionality. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

ChartGridMode.description: Chart grid mode setting. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

TargetEntityType.description: Target entity type for the control. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

ViewId.description: View ID for the control. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

ViewIds.description: View IDs for the control. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

IsUserView.description: Enable user view functionality. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

IsUserChart.description: Enable user chart functionality. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

RelationshipName.description: Relationship name for the control. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

RelationshipRoleOrdinal.description: Relationship role ordinal for the control. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

MaxRowsBeforeScroll.description: Maximum rows before scroll is enabled. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

EnableJumpBar.description: Enable jump bar functionality. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

VisualizationId.description: Visualization ID for the control. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

EnableContextualActions.description: Enable contextual actions. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

TeamTemplateId.description: Team template ID for the control. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

GridUIMode.description: Grid UI mode setting. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

ReferencePanelSubgridIconUrl.description: Reference panel subgrid icon URL. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

HeaderColorCode.description: Header color code for the control. (This parameter is applicable in SubGrid controls)

IsTitle.description: Display as title. (This parameter is applicable in Label controls)

MaxLength.description: Maximum length for text input. (This parameter is applicable in TextBox controls)

Format.description: Format for text input. (This parameter is applicable in TextBox controls)

MinValue.description: Minimum value for number input. (This parameter is applicable in Number controls)

MaxValue.description: Maximum value for number input. (This parameter is applicable in Number controls)

Precision.description: Precision for number input. (This parameter is applicable in Number controls)

QuickForms.description: Quick forms configuration. (This parameter is applicable in QuickFormCollection controls)

ControlMode.description: Control mode setting. (This parameter is applicable in QuickFormCollection controls)

ReferencePanelQuickFormCollectionIconUrl.description: Reference panel quick form collection icon URL. (This parameter is applicable in QuickFormCollection controls)

DisplayAsCustomer360Tile.description: Display as customer 360 tile. (This parameter is applicable in QuickFormCollection controls)

CustomControlFormFactor.description: Form factor for the custom control. (This parameter is applicable in Custom control parameters)

NameOfCustomControl.description: Name of the custom control. (This parameter is applicable in Custom control parameters)

ControlId.description: Control ID for the custom control. (This parameter is applicable in Custom control parameters)
